amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove certain banking restrictions related to Cuba's payment for agricultural purchases from U.S. producers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 110-261 to remove certain banking restrictions related to Cuba's payment for agricultural purchases from U.S. producers. It also authorizes direct transfers between Cuban banks and U.S. banks and allows visas to be issued to conduct activities related to purchasing U.S. agricultural goods.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 245 (Roll no. 749).
